item.title: Optional Rule - Distress Points (DSP)
item.description: Optional Expanded Sanity Rules for Call of Cthulhu Note: These rules are optional and will be discussed during Session Zero. They are designed to enhance the horror experience in long-term campaigns without incapacitating characters through excessive Sanity loss.

item.title: House Rules for Caroline College-An Early 1980's Call of Cthulhu Campaign Setting
item.description: House Rules for Caroline College - An Early 1980's Call of Cthulhu Campaign Setting These house rules are designed to enhance your gaming experience by: Increasing character ...

item.title: Character Creation
item.description: Character creation will happen during session zero. The general method for character creation is found in the 7th ed. of the Call of Cthulhu Keeper's Guide.

item.title: Sly Coolstein
item.description: Sly Coolstein (Head Librarian, Cultist, and Protector) Role: Sly Coolstein is the head (and only full-time) librarian at the Peach Street Library, Watashuka’s only public library ...

item.title: Ronnie Regan
item.description: Ronnie "Moonglow" Regan Role/Title: Assistant Librarian at Peach St. Library High school student, junior Brief Description: Ronnie is a tall and lanky 17-year-old high school junior, with a cascade of curly red hair that often obscures her face when she's engrossed in a book.
